Annotation.note:
If $D$, $E$, $F$ are the traces of a transversal on the sides $BC$, $CA$, $AB$ of a triangle $ABC$ whose orthocenter is $H$, prove that the perpendiculars from $A$, $B$, $C$ upon the lines $HD$, $HE$, $HF$, respectively, are concurrent in a point on the perpendicular from $H$ to $DEF$.
\begin{keywords} geometry theorem proving \end{keywords}
